title: Hi, I'm Harrison
subtitle: I'm a value-minded full-stack developer with a passion for building great experiences for users
metaDescription: Harrison Callahan builds full-stack tools for experiential teams. Self-taught developer turning loose ideas into working systems.

contactCTA.text: Have a rough idea or an active project? Happy to talk it through.

about.title: What I do
about.content:
## I've built a career on being a problem solver that folks can rely on.

On small teams, I'm the person who figures it out. I'm able to identify problems, collaborate with my team, do some research, and whip together a proof-of-concept to test the MVP.

I've spent over *twelve years* working on the web and I've gotten to see it evolve faster than I could have ever imagined. There's never been a better time to be a software engineer than right now.

featuredProjects.title: Selected projects
featuredProjects.subtitle: Here are the projects that I think really define how I think about building software. Click on any card to learn more about the project and my role on it.

recentExperience.title: Recent experience
